text: Akutiji: “Naga tuujile ku Madina, chisimu jwakuchimbichika nnope (achambaga Abdullah bin Ubayi bin Salulu nnongola jwa achinakunaku), chaakankoposye mwalakwemo jwakunyosyeka nnope (achambaga Muhammadi ﷺ).” Kutendaga Allah ni Nsyene uchimbichimbi, kwisa soni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ ni ŵakulupilila, nambo kuti achinakunaku ngakumanyilila
